definition: عوز ‘awiza a (‘awaz) to be or become poor, needy, destitute; -- عاز ‘āza u (‘auz) to need, require (هـ s.th.), be in want or need (هـ of s.th.) IV اعوز a‘waza to be or become poor, needy, destitute │ اعوزه الشيء (šai’u) he lacked the thing, he needed it, he was in want of it عوز ‘awaz lack, need, want, necessity, exigency; poverty, neediness, destitution, indigence, penury عوز ‘awiz poor, needy, destitute, necessitous, indigent
